title: Are left-handed musicians left out of Proms orchestras?
text:
The long-running series in which readers answer other readers’ questions on subjects ranging from trivial flights of fancy to profound scientific and philosophical concepts

After watching the Proms over the summer I noticed that all the musicians, excluding the percussion section, seem to be right-handed. Are left-handed people such as myself excluded or forced to play right-handed? Either way I feel discriminated against.

Phil Ebbrell, North Wales
